quote: If I can just provide value, people will just show up at my door.
why_clipworthy: It highlights the power of value-driven content in attracting clients.
suggested_hook: Want clients to come to you? Here's how providing value can make that happen.

quote: We want to be a REALTOR for life, even if you never buy and sell again.
why_clipworthy: Emphasizes the importance of building lasting relationships with clients.
suggested_hook: Building lifelong relationships in real estate: Here's why it matters.
